email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer the vessel OCEAN STAR for your 12,000MT coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The freight rate is USD 28.50 per MT on CIF terms. Laycan is 25-30 October. Demurrage is USD 20,000 per day.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Can you revise to USD 26.50 per MT? Also, could you confirm the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your response. The OCEAN STAR has a DWT of 75,000 and LOA of 225m. Considering your feedback, we can offer a revised rate of USD 27.00 per MT. This is our best offer given the current market conditions.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

USD 27.00 is acceptable. Can you confirm the laycan and demurrage rate? Also, please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Great! The laycan remains 25-30 October, and the demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day. I will send over the charter party shortly for your review.

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Charter party received and reviewed. Everything looks good. We are ready to proceed with the shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
